items.name: Dine and Dash
items.target: One creature or object per minion

effects.tier1: 4 damage; the ravager can shift 1 square
effects.tier2: 6 damage; the ravager shifts up to 2 squares
effects.tier3: 8 damage; the ravager shifts up to 3 squares

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The ravager's squad's Stamina pool regains Stamina equal to half the damage dealt.

The ravager dies only if their squad's Stamina pool is reduced to 0 Stamina by acid or fire damage, if they end their turn with 0 Stamina in their squad's Stamina pool, or if they take acid or fire damage while their squad's Stamina pool is at 0 Stamina.
